item.title: Get the new Firefox 4.0 beta for Linux 64 bit.
item.description: I wanted to play a bit with the Mozilla Firefox 4.0 beta. Well, if you go to the download site there’s no apparent way to download the 64 bit version of Firefox. This is where I got it: ftp://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/firefox/releases/4.0b1
